definition: variant of 眷[juan4]/to care about/to look fondly on
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

pinyin: you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3

definition: see 有情人終成眷屬|有情人终成眷属[you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3]

sentences.english: These two who have true love marry and have the crystal of their love finally.
sentences.chinese: 这两个有情人终成眷属并且拥有了他们爱情的结晶。

sentences.english: Some of Shakespeare's comedies are ended by a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚的一些喜剧以有情人终成眷属结束。

sentences.english: For the other people's happiness let a way, don't is also a very happy affair.
sentences.chinese: 不也是很幸福的一件事情祝天下的有情人终成眷属。

sentences.english: Just after midnight, the partners of 11 years were married.
sentences.chinese: 子夜刚过，这对11年来的有情人终成眷属。

sentences.english: I wish a happy life lovers get married is a representative.
sentences.chinese: 祝有情人终成眷属是幸福生活的代表。

sentences.english: Then David returned to bless his household.
sentences.chinese: 大卫回家要给眷属祝福。

sentences.english: The chemistry was instant and they married in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 两人立即起了化学反应，并于2007年终成眷属。

sentences.english: Dog the streets to see the world, few people can have family dependents.
sentences.chinese: 看天下满街狼犬，几人能过成眷属。

sentences.english: I have a relative working as a manager in your manufacturing department. Her name is Liuling.
sentences.chinese: 我有个眷属正在贵公司的消费部当经营，她叫刘灵。

sentences.english: Joseph stayed in Egypt, along with all his father's family.
sentences.chinese: 约瑟和他父亲的眷属都住在埃及。

sentences.english: Who said it was all lovers get married, why the Milky way partition binary shore?
sentences.chinese: 谁说那有情人皆成眷属，为什么银河岸隔断双星？

sentences.english: The Sweethearts Spring has the magic to bless people in love with the happy marriage.
sentences.chinese: 情侣泉具有神奇的魔力，使相爱的人终成眷属。

sentences.english: The lovers are united at the conclusion of the movie.
sentences.chinese: 电影结尾时这对情侣终成眷属。

sentences.english: And one of the plot, the similar result is jack shall have Jill.
sentences.chinese: 和1类似的剧情，最后的结局也是有情人终成眷属。

sentences.english: Please enter the second member's information.
sentences.chinese: 请填入第二位眷属的资料。

pinyin: you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3

definition: (to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
chance/opportunity/predestined relationship/(Buddhist) principal and secondary causes/chain of cause and effect
to convert to (a religion)/to rely upon/refuge/mainstay
good karma/opportune connection with marriage partner
relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
to see each other/to meet in person
